TopicTitle: Improvement Suggestion: better UI for contract orbit lines

Articles.Content:
Right now, orbit lines appear in both the tracking station and map mode for contracts I haven't even accepted (that are in the pending list).  This clutters the map mode and can make it difficult or even impossible to line up maneuvers by eye.

Suggestions

  • Add an additional toggle for contract orbits in the tracking station and flight map orbit selector toolpanel
  • Turn off (by default?) orbit lines for contracts that have not yet been accepted
